nodes.text: Olap leaves were a type of leaf found on the Forest Moon of Endor. By 3 ABY, the Ewok shaman Logray used blue Olap leaves to make a potion.
Olap leaves were mentioned in "Blue Harvest," the twelfth episode of the animated television series Ewoks. The episode was written by Paul Dini and Sam Wilson, and it premiered on November 23, 1985.
